response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I propose to sell it to you for $13,000. This offer allows you to acquire an asset valued at a higher price while securing a favorable deal for yourself. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your financial planning and interests. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 13000}
